query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS edge_sync_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  gateway_id INT NOT NULL,
  sync_type ENUM('full', 'incremental', 'manual') DEFAULT 'incremental',
  started_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  completed_at BIGINT,
  records_synced INT DEFAULT 0,
  records_failed INT DEFAULT 0,
  latency_ms INT,
  status ENUM('running', 'completed', 'failed', 'partial') DEFAULT 'running',
  error_message TEXT,
  INDEX idx_sync_gateway (gateway_id),
  INDEX idx_sync_started (started_at)
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  gateway_id INT NOT NULL,
  sync_type ENUM('full', 'incremental', 'manual') DEFAULT 'incremental',
  started_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  completed_at BIGINT,
  records_synced INT DEFAULT 0,
  records_failed INT DEFAULT 0,
  latency_ms INT,
  status ENUM('running', 'completed', 'failed', 'partial') DEFAULT 'running',
  error_message TEXT,
  INDEX idx_sync_gateway (gateway_id),
  INDEX idx_sync_started (started_at)
)
